markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Soaring Flight](/Feats.aspx?ID=5684) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=776" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 34 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per round

**Prerequisites**
[Skyborn Tengu](/Heritages.aspx?ID=357) heritage

</column>

---

You [Fly](/Actions.aspx?ID=2312). If you don't normally have a fly Speed, you gain a fly Speed of 20 feet for this movement. If you aren't on solid ground at the end of this movement, you fall.

<title level="2">Soaring Flight leads to...</title>
[Soaring Form](/Feats.aspx?ID=5686)
name: Soaring Flight
